channel.title: Data Mining on Anam Raihan
channel.description: Recent content in Data Mining on Anam Raihan

item.title: Mining-and-Summarising-Customer-Review
item.description: The objective of this project is to mine the features of the product on which customers have expressed their opinions. Identified frequent features and opinion words and generated opinion summary.

item.title: Movie Rating Predictions
item.description: The project aimed to predict and identify the major factors affected the movie ratings from the dataset provided. Useful features were extracted from classifying techniques like support vector machine
